job.title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: Job Title: <strong>Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML<br><br></strong>Location: <strong>Asheville, NC<br><br></strong>Duration: <strong>Full time/ Long Term contract<br><br></strong><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>BS Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent</li><li>Demonstrated understanding of programming concepts, architecture, and full stack integration</li><li>Coding experience in C++, QML, and Python</li><li>Prior experience with QT GUI programming</li><li>Comfort working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment relying on tools such as GIT</li><li>Ability to document both the requirements and design document as part of standard work.</li><li>Familiarity with hardware control concepts, such as motion control integration</li><li>Background in programming interfaces for equipment</li><li>Embedded Linux OS experience<br></li></ul><strong>You can also apply via: </strong>http://jobd.info/?id=SSrkKp<br><br><strong><u>Recruiter Details<br><br></u></strong><strong>Praveen Rao<br><br></strong>(302) 214-0551<br><br>praveen_us@falconsmartit.com<br><br>Find all current job openings at our Career Page<br><br>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html<br><br>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities<br><br>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
